docs.title: ErsatzTV-Filler
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: ErsatzTV-Filler Installation
docs.text: Installation of ErsatzTV-Filler is as simple as choosing whether to install natively (a 1 click binary file you can download and click on to run) or via docker (a containerised system to run different programs)

docs.title: The Installation Methods for each Operating System are
docs.text: Docker Windows Linux Mac
